title: Easier gifting
body:
I think you should be able to gift your friends skins you already own but don't want.

say i have 3 annie skins but dont want 2 of them because i have annie in wonderland why cant i gift them to my friends 
then they could have an annie skin and i wouldn't have 3 annie skins

this could create a much better gifting system 

also you should be able to gift people champions with ip

replies.body: except x2 the ip, because rito
